prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a brilliant young woman, voluminous auburn mahogany hair, black-framed glasses, white lab coat, blue and red checkered dress
feature_prompt: subsurface scattering on skin, subtle skin texture, crisp lines on glasses, detailed fabric on lab coat, realistic hair strands
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, 3d render, plastic, doll, smooth hair, exaggerated eyes, flat lighting, low quality, blurry face, deformed glasses
